caption:
This photograph captures a roadside scene that focuses on a town population sign for Cathlamet, indicating a population of 656. The sign is prominently featured in the foreground on the right side and is designed with a green background and white lettering. It also includes the profile outline of a person's head facing left.

Behind the sign, the photograph shows a hilly terrain densely covered in greenery and shrubs. Amidst this natural backdrop, you can see residential structures perched on the hill. There are at least three visible houses; they appear traditional, with one of them prominently featuring a white facade and another partially visible at the top of the hill.

Additionally, there is a "Speed Limit 25" sign positioned on a pole just to the left of the population sign. The sky is partly visible at the top of the image, suggesting a clear day. This setting suggests a small-town environment surrounded by natural landscapes, possibly indicating the town's rural and quiet character.
title: Cathlamet, wa
